Reviews.Author: kazabaliaddict

Reviews.Content: Great Location Hotel is average rooms are basic, the pool is good not too many people always a sunbed free. They make great cocktails. The only thing is mosquitos and they have lots of them. So close to beach our boys just loved walking across road to go surfing. Small hotel but great location
Reviews.Author: meesha10

Reviews.Content: Great and close to the Beach This seemed like luxury after a week of basic hotels. The main room was large and we had a second area which could be shut off by doors--great because our son slept there. It is just off Kuta Beach--but far enough off to be quiet. The room was clean; the bed was comfortable. The swimming pool area was lovelyOur Indonesian travel agent (Herry Travel) booked this for us and so our rate was a little lower than posted. We liked this hotel!
Reviews.Author: JeanEdmontonCanada
